s1.message: The following lists the major changes compared to Adblock Plus 0.6:

s4.message: Sidebar can be detached (button in the upper-right corner)

s5.message: Showing the filter that has been applied in the sidebar's tooltip

s6.message: Double-click on a blocked/whitelisted item in the sidebar selects the filter in the Preferences dialog automatically

s7.message: Toolbar icon in Firefox (customizable — can be moved around or removed)

s8.message: Status bar icon has a context menu (same as the toolbar icon's menu)

s9.message: Middle-click on the icon in the toolbar or status bar disables/re-enables Adblock Plus

s10.message: Added minimal support for "DIV blocking" (see FAQ for details)

s12.message: Added translations: German, Spanish, Italian, Russian, Polish, Slovak, Lithuanian, Romanian, Finnish, Turkish, Japanese

s13.message: Made Adblock Plus show up as an icon in the status bar (optional now, can be removed via Options)

s14.message: Mozilla Suite/Seamonkey: Added the sidebar and made it behave in the same way as in Firefox (opening via menu or Ctrl+Shift+B works)

s15.message: Removed limit for tooltip size in the sidebar

s16.message: Sidebar now tells that a page is whitelisted instead of "no blockable items"

s17.message: Sidebar always updating properly now even when going to a page without blockable items

s18.message: Whitelisting a site or a single page possible via toolbar icon's menu

s19.message: Preferences dialog: Filters are grouped by type

s20.message: Preferences dialog: Added a warning when Adblock Plus is disabled

s21.message: Preferences dialog: "Sort alphabetically" only sorts visually and any sorting applies immediately

s22.message: Preferences dialog: Sorting ignores non-alphabetical characters

s24.message: Preferences dialog: Reordering of filters via context menu or Ctrl-Up/Down (not when sorting is enabled)

s25.message: Preferences dialog: Blocked items in the suggestions list can also be selected now

s26.message: Preferences dialog: Using platform's line breaks for exported filters

s27.message: Preferences dialog: Added option to cancel the warning when importing filters

s28.message: Preferences dialog: OK doesn't perform "Add filter" automatically any more

s29.message: Preferences dialog: Moved parts of the "Options" menu into the new "Filters" menu

s30.message: Preferences dialog: Made menu items and OK button disable when necessary

s31.message: Preferences dialog: Options apply immediately now

s32.message: Preferences dialog: Line height decreased for the filters list and suggestions dropdown

s34.message: Made whitelisting apply to individual items as well, not only complete web pages

s35.message: Improved handling of frames (fixed: blocked frames wouldn't show up in the sidebar)

s36.message: When the option "block banner links" is used those links are treated as a separate element and can be blocked via context menu

s37.message: Optionally blocking ads in local pages now (enabled by default, some RSS readers need this)

s38.message: Uninstalling Adblock/Adblock Plus 0.5 automatically now (advising manual uninstall in Mozilla Suite and Seamonkey)

s41.message: Flash/Java tabs aren't always visible and break the page's design in some rare cases

s42.message: Frames without blockable elements (including blocked frames) don't show up in the sidebar when going back to a page via history

s43.message: Tooltip for the toolbar icon is the same as for the status bar, isn't quite correct there
